name: Formula 1 Grand Prix
description:
Back of Case - Atari ST (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Experience the thrills and spills of Formula 1 Racing, whether you own an older banger, a Porsche Turbo or are too young to drive, you too will enjoy the challenge of competing on the track. Choose from one of the five powerful Turbo charged racers, all set up with different handling and performance characteristics to compete against the best drivers in the world over the six Championship Circuits:
The game features:
SIX FAMOUS CIRCUITS       FIVE CARS OF DIFFERING PERFORMANCES       SIX SPEED GEARBOXES       ENGINE REV. LIMITS       TIMED PRACTICE LABS FOR GRID POSITION       UP TO THREE CARS ON THE TRACK AT THE SAME TIME       ONE RACE OR CHAMPIONSHIP SERIES       LAP RECORDS       CIRCUIT RECORDS       WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS
A superb race game no 16 Bit owner should be without - the ultimate driving experience.
